title: STUDY PLAN
content: The Master's in Marketing, Innovation, and Technology is a flagship program offered by the Indonesian School of Public Transportation to produce professionals proficient in strategic marketing, innovation development, and the application of cutting-edge technology. This program integrates theoretical learning, applied research, and practical experience to meet the growing needs of the transportation industry. Students will gain deep insights into data-driven marketing strategies, innovative solution development, and technology implementation to enhance efficiency and sustainability. With a globally relevant curriculum and support from experts, this program prepares graduates to be visionary leaders in managing challenges and opportunities in the public transportation sector.
